TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MarkupExtension extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the abstract class for all Markup extensions for types. This class must be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
This class, through its descendents, provides a mark-up representation for various types, such as arrays.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class. This class must be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object ProvideValue(class System.IServiceProvider provider) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, provides the value for the underlying type, by optional use of an <xref:System.IServiceProvider>.
